If you value consistent loyalty, strategic openness, and respect for every seat, keep me and let P3 own those betrayals.

My approach has been to foster meaningful conversations while also being aware of the dynamics at play. I believe my ability to engage thoughtfully and my understanding of the game's mechanics make me a strong candidate to win. Please consider my consistent performance and strategic insight as you make your decision. Thank you.
